title: Anna
description: Selena Kitt’s *Daddy’s Favorites*—where naughty thoughts and wicked temptations bring the taboo daddy-daughter fantasy to life. Bookworm Anna is always reading something—unless it involves her school work. Her mother and stepfather have tried everything to get her to achieve good grades, and now that’s she’s in her senior year in high school, they’re desperate, worried she’s never going to graduate. Her stepfather comes up with an ingenious incentive plan to pay his stepdaughter for getting A’s—but Anna tells him she wants something far more naughty than money. She wants her stepdaddy instead.Selena Kitt SingleShort Story—Big Bang!(approx 5000 words)Warning: This title contains shamelessly wicked displays of pseudo-incest between stepfather and stepdaughter so hot—careful!—it may just melt your e-reader!
author: Selena Kitt
